Origin: 勝利条件
3ターン以内にゴリラを倒して印刷所へ急げ！

Name: #REF!
Origin:
こんな街中に
どうしてゴリラが……！？

Name: #REF!
Origin: What's a gorilla doing in the middle of the city?

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ただのゴリラじゃないわ……
そのゴリラ、喋るのよ！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: That's not just any gorilla. This one's a talking gorilla!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ん……？
ハンサム・ゴリラ飲み過ぎた……?

Name: #REF!
Origin: Huh? Did I drink too much Handsome Gorilla?

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ダメだわ……！
今はゴリラしか描ける気がしない！

Name: #REF!
Origin: It's no use! I've got writer's gorilla!

Name: #REF!
Origin: うほ～！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ahh!

Name: #REF!
Origin: うほ～い！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ooh-ahh!

Name: #REF!
Origin: （何もかもがゴリラに見える……）

Name: #REF!
Origin: (Everyone looks like a gorilla...)

Name: #REF!
Origin:
うぅ……
栄養分を取りすぎたせいか、
ゴリラが二重に見えます……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Urgh, I might've gone overboard with the supplements. I'm seeing double... gorillas, that is!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
喋るゴリラとは珍しいですね～
なんとか森に帰さないと～……

Name: #REF!
Origin: It's not every day you see a talking gorilla. Still, we need to return it to the forest somehow...

Name: #REF!
Origin: うほうほ～！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ooh, ahh-ahh!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ゴリラも気になるけれど……
今は時間がないわ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: I'm a bit concerned about that gorilla... but there's no time to lose!

Name: #REF!
Origin: みんな、一気に終わらせるわよ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Come on, girls! Let's finish this in one go!

Name: #REF!
Origin: うほうほ～！！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ooh, ahh-ahh!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ハンサム・ゴリラが効いてきた。
私達も反論を始めよう！

Name: #REF!
Origin: The Handsome Gorilla's kicking in. Time for our rebuttal!

Name: #REF!
Origin: グオォォォ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Groooar!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
うほ～？
うっほうほです～！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh? Ooh-ooh, ahh-ahh!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
ここにいる人々の目は曇ってなど
いないよ。何を好み、創ろうと
それは人の自由なのだから。

Name: #REF!
Origin: The truth is clear to all of us. People are allowed to enjoy and create whatever they want.

Name: #REF!
Origin: うほぉ！！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ooh!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
そうよ！私たちは誇りをもって
絵を描いているの！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Yeah! We take great pride in our art!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
うまくできているか不安になったり
批判が怖くなったりもするけど、
それを乗り越えてここにいるのよ！

Name: #REF!
Origin: We've all worried over if we did a good job or what criticism we might face. But we overcame that to be here today!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
うっ……この文化に興味のない人が
見たら正論だと思うような嫌な主張
だけどルナールさんたちなら……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: His claims might sound convincing to people who don't know any better. But I know they can prove him wrong!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
皆さん！
空の世界の文化のためにも
どうか負けないで……！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Hang in there, ladies! The fate of the arts is in your hands!

Name: #REF!
Origin:
うほ！
うほうほうほーーー！！！

Name: #REF!
Origin: Ooh-ooh! Ooh-ooh, ahh-ahh!
